cheaperWithdraw().notice: instead of always keep reading from storage, what we gonna do is read the entire array into memore, 1 time. And then read from memory instead from constantly read from storage.

getOwner().notice: We will make some getter functions in order to make easier to anyone that interacts with our API to read the variables because calling 'i_' ir 's_' is a bit strange for using the variables

userdoc.notice: This contract is to demo a simple funding contract"s_" means that it's a storage variable, which consumes a lot of gas."i_" is a good practice for immutable variablesfor constant variables, we use CAPSLOCK
